title: The Hits Just Keep On Comin'
description: Cari Champion weighs in on the attitudes & social approaches of Colin Kaepernick & Cam Newton, pointing out the similarities & differences in public perception of the two QBs.

itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
itunes:subtitle: Cari Champion weighs in on the attitudes & social approaches of Colin Kaepernick & Cam Newton, pointing out the similarities & differences in public perception of the two QBs.
